alt_txt: A white omega with a balloon in the center on a red-brown background
title: Vice President
desc: Silver medalist in 2022 ICPC Southeast USA Regional.
Apply knowledge of data structures and algorithms to solve programming problems under time pressure while communicating in a team of 3 to solve problems collaboratively.

alt_txt: A white gator head on a light blue background
title: Workshop Lead
desc: Create, coordinate, and lead weekly technical workshops that teach software engineering skills to undergraduate students.

alt_txt: A drawing of a red and green neon sign of the phrase 'Open Source'
title: Technical Lead
desc: Contributed to manim-data-structures, a plugin for the Manim math animation library to add support for animating data structures.

alt_txt: A drawing of Earth behind a mountain with the words "2023 Youth Climate Summit wrapping around Earth"
title: Website developer
desc: Worked in a team to collaboratively develop a functional and responsive website with React that educated viewers on climate change and provided information on attending the 2022 Miami Youth Climate Summit
